Description:
Detects an attacker trying to enable the outlook security setting "EnableUnsafeClientMailRules" which allows outlook to run applications or execute macros

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Outlook EnableUnsafeClientMailRules Setting Enabled - Registry
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where target_object like '%\outlook\security\enableunsafeclientmailrules' and details = 'dword (0x00000001)'
